docs.text: CSE 30 Notes Here is a collection of my Notes for CSE 30: Computer Organization at UCSD Homework 0 topics include binary numbers representation, bases conversion, signed vs unsigned numbers, 2's complement, overflow addition, overflow subtraction, fixed point representation. - Link to Homework 0 content Homework 1 topics include TBD - Link to Homework 1 content Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.
